page.title: 19ART & CRAFT/COTTAGE INDUSTRY
page.content: Denton is very fortunate to have a large number of skilled persons in various forms of{handicrafts.}There are several painters,most women knit & sew & some perform beautiful embroidery.{Old skills}such as spinning,weaving,smocking & tapestry work still survive.Some men still carve wood.One man has turned wood- turning on a lathe,into a cottage industry.Another woman has developed her own designs on a knitting machine & also has a small{business}selling her goods by mail order.Most women cook of course,one women has a business decorating cakes for special occasions,the results can truly be called art! Other{hobbies}include "do-it-yourself",home decorating, photography,horse-riding & gardening. A potter has also developed his own business(see Tourism).
